踩.definition: to step on; to tread; to stamp; to press a pedal; to pedal (a bike); (online) to downvote

踩剎車.definition: to step on the brake; to brake (when driving)

踩動.definition: to operate by means of a pedal

踩水.definition: to tread water; to paddle or tramp in shallow water

踩線.definition: to scout for a tour operator; to reconnoiter a potential tour itinerary; (tennis) to commit a foot fault

踩線團.definition: group on a tour to get acquainted with the local situation

踩雷.definition: to step on a mine; (fig.) to inadvertently do sth that has an unpleasant result; (fig.) to be accidentally exposed to a spoiler

踩點.definition: to reconnoiter; to case the joint; to cut it fine; to arrive with no time to spare; to dance to the beat
